last_episode_to_air.name: The Dark Red Caper
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Carmen sinks further into V.I.L.E.'s clutches, her crew teams up with A.C.M.E. to get the old Carmen back. But is it too late?

name: Carmen Sandiego
overview: A master thief who uses her skills for good, Carmen Sandiego travels the world foiling V.I.L.E.'s evil plans -- with help from her savvy sidekicks.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A master thief who uses her skills for good, Carmen Sandiego travels the world foiling V.I.L.E.'s evil plans -- with help from her savvy sidekicks.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The stakes are higher than ever for Carmen and her crew as V.I.L.E. unleashes a host of highly trained new operatives while A.C.M.E. closes in.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Carmen and her crew touch down in Mexico City, New Orleans, Venice and more on their quest to stay one step ahead of V.I.L.E.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: From the snowy Himalayas to the pyramids of Egypt, Carmen and friends race to stay one step ahead of V.I.L.E. on their latest adventures.

episodes.name: Becoming Carmen Sandiego (1)
episodes.overview: Mischievous orphan Carmen enrolls at V.I.L.E. Academy, a school for thieves. Given the code name Black Sheep, she makes fast friends ... and enemies.

episodes.name: Becoming Carmen Sandiego (2)
episodes.overview: Carmen crashes the graduates' caper, touching down at an archaeological dig site. But learning the truth about V.I.L.E. sets her on a new path.

episodes.name: The Sticky Rice Caper
episodes.overview: Player navigates Carmen, Zack and Ivy to a secret lab in Indonesia, where V.I.L.E. is developing a fungus designed to destroy the country's rice.

episodes.name: The Fishy Doubloon Caper
episodes.overview: While exploring a shipwreck off the coast of Ecuador, Carmen stumbles upon hidden treasure -- and an old rival. Meanwhile, two agents kidnap Devineaux.

episodes.name: The Duke of Vermeer Caper
episodes.overview: In Amsterdam, Carmen goes undercover to nab a mastermind who's been replacing priceless paintings with amazingly accurate forgeries.

episodes.name: The Opera in the Outback Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen tangles with V.I.L.E. operative Le Chevre at the Sydney Opera House. Crackle's there, too -- but he doesn't recognize Carmen. Hmmm.

episodes.name: The Chasing Paper Caper
episodes.overview: When V.I.L.E. schemes to steal the Magna Carta from a Mumbai museum, Carmen squares off with a former classmate: origami expert Paper Star.

episodes.name: The Lucky Cat Caper
episodes.overview: In foggy San Francisco, Carmen attends an elegant charity auction. When Mime Bomb steals a $10 million stamp, Carmen follows his trail to Chinatown.

episodes.name: The French Connection Caper
episodes.overview: Suspecting Carmen isn't working alone, Shadowsan and Coach Brunt interrogate Devineaux. Carmen uncovers the truth about her mysterious past.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A master thief who uses her skills for good, Carmen Sandiego travels the world foiling V.I.L.E.'s evil plans -- with help from her savvy sidekicks.

episodes.name: The Hot Rocks of Rio Caper (1)
episodes.overview: After spotting a V.I.L.E. operative in Prague, Carmen travels to Rio de Janeiro to find the source of stolen alexandrite gemstones.

episodes.name: The Hot Rocks of Rio Caper (2)
episodes.overview: Carmen, Ivy and Zack track V.I.L.E. through Rio and uncover a devious plot at a colorful Carnival parade.

episodes.name: The Daisho Caper
episodes.overview: When Carmen and her crew jet off to Japan, V.I.L.E. sets a trap by stealing a priceless samurai sword from a castle.

episodes.name: The Fashionista Caper
episodes.overview: The gang plays fashion police in Milan when V.I.L.E. designs hats with mind-control devices that turn runway models into thieves.

episodes.name: The Boston Tea Party Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen, Ivy and Zack reminisce about the caper that first brought them together: catching V.I.L.E. with a stash of counterfeit cash.

episodes.name: The Need for Speed Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen and the team zoom off to a posh party in Dubai to steal a high-speed supercar before V.I.L.E. can get to it first.

episodes.name: The Crackle Goes Kiwi Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen enlists an old friend's help for a high-tech heist: breaking into Dr. Bellum's New Zealand lab to disable a dangerous device.

episodes.name: The Stockholm Syndrome Caper
episodes.overview: As A.C.M.E. closes in on Carmen in Sweden, she finds herself in a perilous predicament -- and it's up to Ivy to thwart V.I.L.E.'s latest scheme.

episodes.name: The African Ice Caper
episodes.overview: After recovering from her icy ordeal, Carmen travels to Botswana to bust up an illegal diamond mining operation.

episodes.name: The Deep Dive Caper
episodes.overview: Rocked by a new revelation about her past, Carmen returns to V.I.L.E. Island to uncover the truth.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The stakes are higher than ever for Carmen and her crew as V.I.L.E. unleashes a host of highly trained new operatives while A.C.M.E. closes in.

episodes.name: The Luchadora Tango Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen searches for clues to her mother's identity in Veracruz, Mexico, where she befriends a fierce luchadora: a masked wrestler!

episodes.name: The Day of the Dead Caper
episodes.overview: As Mexico City celebrates Día de los Muertos — the Day of the Dead — Carmen tracks a young art thief who's just been recruited by V.I.L.E.

episodes.name: The Haunted Bayou Caper
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, a celebrity chef hosts a costume gala at his spooky mansion. V.I.L.E. crashes the party — but what are they after?

episodes.name: The Masks of Venice Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen, Ivy and Zack reunite with an old friend in Venice, where V.I.L.E. plots to steal priceless masks from a museum.

episodes.name: The Jolly Good Show Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen and her crew break into the Tower of London to stop V.I.L.E. from nabbing the Crown Jewels. But it's a trap!

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Carmen and her crew touch down in Mexico City, New Orleans, Venice and more on their quest to stay one step ahead of V.I.L.E.

episodes.name: The Beijing Bullion Caper
episodes.overview: V.I.L.E. plots to kidnap a dignitary who manages China's largest gold reserve, setting the stage for a high-flying battle at a Beijing opera house.

episodes.name: The Big Bad Ivy Caper
episodes.overview: While Zack stays home with Shadowsan, Carmen and Ivy jet off to Bavaria to track a vicious villain and a stash of stolen gold.

episodes.name: The Robo Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen and Ivy fight a giant robot at a science museum in Singapore. Later, a tip from Player sends the friends to Iceland.

episodes.name: The Himalayan Rescue Caper
episodes.overview: Carmen heads to V.I.L.E.'s hideout in the Himalayas on a rescue mission. She needs Player's help — but he's stuck in school.

episodes.name: The V.I.L.E. History Caper
episodes.overview: The friends race against V.I.L.E. on the hunt for ancient treasure, searching for three relics hidden in different parts of the world.

episodes.name: The Egyptian Decryption Caper
episodes.overview: Jules works to crack the final code, pointing Carmen to the pyramids of Giza. But V.I.L.E. throws a wrench in their plans.

episodes.name: The Viennese Waltz Caper
episodes.overview: Shadowsan, Ivy and Zack fly to Vienna to intercept V.I.L.E.'s latest heist, hoping it'll lead them to the missing Carmen.

episodes.name: The Dark Red Caper
episodes.overview: As Carmen sinks further into V.I.L.E.'s clutches, her crew teams up with A.C.M.E. to get the old Carmen back. But is it too late?

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: From the snowy Himalayas to the pyramids of Egypt, Carmen and friends race to stay one step ahead of V.I.L.E. on their latest adventures.
